SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT321
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Instruction to Settle a Third Party Loan/Deposit
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by a fund manager to the fund's custodian to advise the trade details and instruct the settlement of a fixed term loan/deposit done with a third party financial institution. The trade may cover one single trade or one block trade.
The definition of third party must be agreed up front between the fund manager and the custodian relative to deals executed by the custodians' treasury area on behalf of the fund manager.
This message is used to:
a) provide details about a new contract between the parties
b) provide details of a rollover/renovation of a contract between the parties
c) provide details of the maturity of a contract
d) cancel a previously sent message.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: This is a request to cancel a previously sent instruction for a loan/deposit.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: This is a new instruction for a loan/deposit.

Validation.Comment: Sub-function, when present, must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: This message is being sent as a copy, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: The message is being sent as a copy, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: The message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is BLOC, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BLCH
Code.Description: The transaction is a block trade child.

Code.Name: BLPA
Code.Description: The transaction is a block trade parent.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is TLDE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CONF
Code.Description: This is an instruction to settle a first confirmation.

Code.Name: MATU
Code.Description: This is an instruction to settle a liquidation of a fixed loan/deposit.

Code.Name: ROLL
Code.Description: This is an instruction to settle a mutually agreed rollover/renewal with/without change in the principal amount and the interest to be settled or added/substracted from that amount.

Validation.Comment: Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
When Qualifier is DPLO, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BORR
Code.Description: The Sender, or the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is sent is the borrower (receives the principal amount and pays the interest).

Code.Name: LEND
Code.Description: The Sender, or the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is sent is the lender (pays the principal amount and receives the interest).

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is MICO, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: A007
Code.Description: '30E/360' or 'Eurobond Basis'.

Code.Name: A008
Code.Description: 'Actual/365' or 'Actual/Actual' (28-31/365-6).

Qualifier.Name: LDFP
Qualifier.Description: Last Day of First Interest Period

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .

Qualifier.Name: SETT
Qualifier.Description: Currency and Amount to be Settled

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
When Sign is present, Rate must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
Name & Address must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
Proprietary Code must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'(Error code(s): T26).
When Qualifier is PRIT, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: APCP
Code.Description: Settlement Instructions for Amounts Payable by the Loan/Deposit Counterparty.

Code.Name: APFM
Code.Description: Settlement Instructions for Amounts Payable by the Investor.

Code.Name: IPCP
Code.Description: Settlement Instructions for Interests Payable by the Loan/Deposit Counterparty.

Code.Name: IPFM
Code.Description: Settlement Instructions for Interests Payable by the Investor.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

If Qualifier is CDEA, INT2, INTE or ACCW, Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory - Corporations for more information on BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations. (Error code(s): C05) .
Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ACCW, ALTE, BENM, CDEA, INT2, INTE
Validation.Comment: Proprietary Code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1-1 In sequence B, the presence of field 19A and of the Next Interest Due Date (field :98A::INTR) depends on the Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): C59).
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "CONF", B[0].F98A[0].INTR.$size > 0 && B[0].F19A[0].SETT.$size == 0 && B[0].F19A[0].RODI.$size == 0 && B[0].F19A[0].CINT.$size == 0 && B[0].F19A[0].NINT.$size > 0 , true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, the presence of field 19A and of the Next Interest Due Date (field :98A::INTR) depends on the Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): C59):"

fieldvalidation.name: C1-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C1-2 In sequence B, the presence of field 19A and of the Next Interest Due Date (field :98A::INTR) depends on the Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): C59).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, the presence of field 19A and of the Next Interest Due Date (field :98A::INTR) depends on the Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): C59):"

fieldvalidation.name: C1-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C1-3 In sequence B, the presence of field 19A and of the Next Interest Due Date (field :98A::INTR) depends on the Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): C59).
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "MATU", B[0].F98A[0].INTR.$size == 0 && B[0].F19A[0].SETT.$size > 0 && B[0].F19A[0].RODI.$size == 0 && B[0].F19A[0].NINT.$size == 0 , true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, the presence of field 19A and of the Next Interest Due Date (field :98A::INTR) depends on the Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) in sequence A as follows (Error code(s): C59):"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In Sequence A, if Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) (a)is MATU, then in Sequence B field ':98A::LDFP' is not allowed (b)is not MATU, then in Sequence B field ':98A::LDFP' is optional(Error code(s): C61).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence A, if Type of Loan/Deposit Event (field :22H::TLDE) (a)is MATU, then in Sequence B field ':98A::LDFP' is not allowed (b)is not MATU, then in Sequence B field ':98A::LDFP' is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 In Sequence B, (a) if Last Day of the First Interest Period (field :98A::LDFP) is present then Number of Days Accrued (field :99B::DAAC) is mandatory (b) if Last Day of the First Interest Period (field :98A::LDFP) is not present then Number of Days Accrued (field :99B::DAAC) is not allowed (Error code(s): C62).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence B, (a) if Last Day of the First Interest Period (field :98A::LDFP) is present then Number of Days Accrued (field :99B::DAAC) is mandatory (b) if Last Day of the First Interest Period (field :98A::LDFP) is not present then Number of Days Accrued (field :99B::DAAC) is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C4-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-1 In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field:95a::CDEA for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field:95a::CDEA for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C4-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-2 In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::INT2 for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::INT2 for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C4-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-3 In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::INTE for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::INTE for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C4-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-4 In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::ACCW for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::ACCW for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C4-5
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-5 In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::BENM for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E84).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of sequence C, the party field :95a::BENM for subsequence C1 cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 One occurrence of sequence C must have the value: :22H::PRIT//APFM (Error code(s): E90).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "One occurrence of sequence C must have the value: :22H::PRIT//APFM"

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.comment: C6 One occurrence of sequence C must have the value: :22H::PRIT//APCP (Error code(s): E90).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "One occurrence of sequence C must have the value: :22H::PRIT//APCP"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-1 In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//APFM cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E92).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//APFM cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-2 In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//APCP cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E92).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//APCP cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-3 In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//IPFM cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E92).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//IPFM cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C7-4 In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//IPCP cannot appear more than once (Error code(s): E92).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In a message, the sequence C field :22H::PRIT//IPCP cannot appear more than once"

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: C8 The currency code in the amount fields (field 19A in Sequence B) must be the same for all occurrences of this field in the message (Error code(s): C02)
fieldvalidation.formula: If(B.F19A.SETT.$size > 0, B.F19A.SETT[0].Currency_Code == B.F19A.PRIN[0].Currency_Code, true) && If(B.F19A.NINT.$size > 0, B.F19A.NINT[0].Currency_Code == B.F19A.PRIN[0].Currency_Code, true) && If(B.F19A.CINT.$size > 0, B.F19A.CINT[0].Currency_Code == B.F19A.PRIN[0].Currency_Code, true) && If(B.F19A.RODI.$size > 0, B.F19A.RODI[0].Currency_Code == B.F19A.PRIN[0].Currency_Code, true)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in the amount fields (field 19A in Sequence B) must be the same for all occurrences of this field in the message"

fieldvalidation.name: C9-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-1 In each occurrence of Sequence C, if field :22H::PRIT is APCP or IPCP then In one occurrence of Subseq. C1 field 95a::CDEA is Mandatory (Error code(s): E91).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Sequence C, if field :22H::PRIT is APCP or IPCP then In one occurrence of Subseq. C1 field 95a::CDEA is Mandatory"

fieldvalidation.name: C9-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C9-2 In each occurrence of Sequence C, if field :22H::PRIT is APFM or IPFM then In one occurrence of Subseq. C1 field 95a::ACCW is Mandatory (Error code(s): E91).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of Sequence C, if field :22H::PRIT is APFM or IPFM then In one occurrence of Subseq. C1 field 95a::ACCW is Mandatory"

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 In sequence A, the presence of the Number Count (field :99B) depends on the presence of the Block Trade Indicator (field 22H::BLOC) as follows (a) Sequence A if field :22H::BLOC is Present then field :99B in sequence A is Mandatory (b) Sequence A if field :22H::BLOC is Not Present then field :99B in sequence A is Not allowed (Error code(s): C60).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of the Number Count (field :99B) depends on the presence of the Block Trade Indicator (field 22H::BLOC) as follows (a) Sequence A if field :22H::BLOC is Present then field :99B in sequence A is Mandatory (b) Sequence A if field :22H::BLOC is Not Present then field :99B in sequence A is Not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C11
fieldvalidation.comment: In sequence A, if field 99B is present, then all qualifiers must be present
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 99B is present, then all qualifiers must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C12
fieldvalidation.comment: C12 In subsequence B3, all orders of field 95a are optional, but at least one order (any one) must be present (Error code(s): D92).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In subsequence B3, all orders of field 95a are optional, but at least one order (any one) must be present."
